biography: Sami is a highly accomplished golfer who calls Hirsala Golf his home club.
He has consistently demonstrated his skill and dedication to the game through several appearances at the prestigious Hector Trophée invitational.

Sami first graced the Hector Trophée in 2022, showcasing his talent in this challenging annual tournament. His participation continued in 2023, 2024, and 2025, highlighting his commitment to this event and his ongoing pursuit of excellence.

While Sami has yet to claim victory in either the Hector Trophée team competition or the Victor individual award, his consistent presence in this top-tier tournament speaks volumes about his capabilities.  We eagerly anticipate his continued strong performance in future competitions.
